Neighbours at war: Truce struck over gun range, shared road in rural Nelson https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/neighbours-at-war-truce-struck-over-gun-range-shared-road-in-rural-nelson/VFG7QNEDSBCW7APRRQC7547ULI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/neighbours-at-war-truce-struck-over-gun-range-shared-road-in-rural-nelson/VFG7QNEDSBCW7APRRQC7547ULI/ Tracy NealLegal shots fired between neighbours over gun range and security cameras on right-of-way. Sat, 09 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Kendall Smart with dog Gumboot at his hilltop property in north Nelson. Smart applied for a restraining order against his neighbour after a dispute over the shared access to their properties. A judge granted the order and also issued one against Smart. Photo / NZME
